1.21.1.1.6.6.7R: - Fixed non-monster invasion mobs naturally despawning and string list config options not working in the in-game config menu.
1.21.1.1.6.6.6R: - Fixed a broken config option and added support for breeze targeting if another mod wants to fix the breeze.
1.21.1.1.6.6.5B: - Datapack tweaks, fixed legacy issue with blacklisting invasions and blacklisting hyper charged mobs.
1.21.1.1.6.6.4B: - Datapack tweaks, small rendering optimization, and changed spawning rules for balancing.
1.21.1.1.6.6.3B: - Fixed invasions crashing when they are triggered too quickly in succession.
1.21.1.1.6.6.1B: - Bug fixes, community requested features, and a crash fix with Forgified-Fabric.
1.21.1.1.6.6.0B: - Bug fixes, datapack improvements, and performance improvements.
1.21.1.1.6.5.7B: - Bug fixes and improvements to the music system.
1.21.1.1.6.5.6B: - Fixed crash creating a dimension mid-game (Now requires a reload for invasions to start in the dimension).
1.21.1.1.6.5.5B: - Attempt 2 at fixing the AE2 crash.
1.21.1.1.6.5.4B: - Fixed AE2 compat crash, config updating issues, and did some small optimizations to fetching config values.
1.21.1.1.6.5.2B: - Bug fixes, optimizations, and finally added the in-game config menu!

1.21.1.6.5.0B: - Fixed a bug with villager ai breaking after an invasion & added new 1.21 mobs into invasions.

1.20.6.1.6.3.2B: - Readded Solar and Lunar eclipse invasions after mistakenly deleting them...
1.20.6.1.6.3.1B: - Fixed a bug with villager ai breaking after an invasion.
1.20.6.1.6.3.0B: - Updated to 1.20.6, a new spawning method, quality of life changes & bug fixes.

1.20.4.1.6.2.2R: - Fixed a bug with villager ai breaking after an invasion.
1.20.4.1.6.2.1R: - Fixed music toast not rendering correctly.

1.20.2.1.6.1.2B: - Fixed a bug with villager ai breaking after an invasion.

1.20.1.1.6.6.3R-LTS1: Backport of 1.6.6.3B and fixed Game Stages support.
1.20.1.1.6.6.2R-LTS1: Backport of 1.6.6.2B with Game Stages support.
1.20.1.1.6.0.5R: - Fixed a bug with villager ai breaking after an invasion.
1.20.1.1.6.0.4R: - A couple of fixes to avoid crashing worlds.
1.20.1.1.6.0.3R: - Fixed a bug where another mod crashing will cause invasion mobs to not load properly, thus redirecting the crash to Pure Suffering.
1.20.1.1.6.0.2R: - Fixed a bug with villagers and small optimization tweaks.
1.20.1.1.6.0.1R: - Fixed non-mob related explosions causing the level to crash.
1.20.1.1.6.0.0R: - Fixed a laundry list of bugs, new visual effects, new sound effects, more polish, and new Invasions!
1.20.1.1.5.1.0R: - Many important bug fixes, rebalancing, command & config changes, & some optimizations.
1.20.1.1.5.0.0R: - Another big update, check the Github changelog.
1.20.1.1.4.4.0R:
- Updated to 1.20.1
- Fixed hyper charge layer rendering on non-mob entities.

1.19.4.1.4.3.0R:
- Updated to 1.19.4
- Fixed End Invasions crashing.
- Fixed secondary mystery invasion command text.

1.19.3.1.4.2.0R:
- Changed 'explosionsDestroyBlocks' Config option to 'invasionAntiGrief' to include fire spreading.
- Slight performance optimizations.
1.19.3.1.4.1.1R: - Fixed a desync issue bricking players out of their world.

1.19.2.1.4.0R: - Check the Github, another big change list >.>
1.19.2.1.3.6R:
- Fixed broken skybox
- Another attempt at improving shader compatibility.
- Optimized code throughout the mod.
1.19.2.1.3.4B: - Slightly bugged but functional port for 1.19.2

1.18.2.1.3.3.2R: - Fixed a desync issue bricking players out of their world.
1.18.2.1.3.3.1R: - Fixed the Skybox to give 1.18.2 some love.
1.18.2.1.3.3B: - Fixed a bug when spawning a mob with no players in the world.
1.18.2.1.3.2A: - Slightly bugged but functional port for 1.18.2

1.16.5.1.3.1.1R: - Fixed a desync issue bricking players out of their world.
1.16.5.1.3.1R: - Fixed a bug crashing when reloading a server that stopped while an invasion was active.
1.16.5.1.3.0R: - First Release version with many bug fixes and more content! Details on the Github page.
1.16.5.1.2.1B: - Crucial Bug fixes and 2 new Config Options.
1.16.5.1.2.0B: - So Much stuff changed that you might as well just look on my GitHub.
1.16.5.1.1.2B:
- Fixed Invasions returning as null.
- Added config option to make the delay between Invasions consistent 'consistentInvasions'.
- Updated Forge to 36.2.0
1.16.5.1.1.1B: - Fixed exploding ghast balls caused by despawned ghasts crashing the world
1.16.5.1.1.0B:
- Added new Invasion XP System.
- Fix Auto Agro
